37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: A'isha reported that a woman said:Allah's Messenger, may I say to my (co-wife) that my husband has given me (such and such) a thing but which he has not in fact gives me? 'Thereupon Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said: The one who makes a false statement of that which one has not been given is like one who wears a garment of falsehood

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّزْوِيرِ، فِي اللِّبَاسِ وَغَيْرِهِ وَالتَّشَبُّعِ بِمَا لَمْ يُعْطَ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Wearing A Garment Of Falsehood Etc., And Pretending To Have That Which Has Not Been Given To One
